website_summaries.verdict: 25-pack of 3-inch ultra-thin but durable cutting wheels for use in hard-to-reach areas.
pros: Made with reinforced fiberglass mesh and a heat-treated aluminum oxide grain bonding matrix for greater safety, lateral stability, and longevity
Ultra-thin design for minimal material loss and less heat, but still strong and fast-cutting
Excellent price for this quantity of thin blades
cons: Well-liked by purchasers, with only one user "not impressed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a die grinder
customer_reviews.text: These cut off wheels are a deal! Have already gone through a few with zero issues. Use these on a new battery powered right angle die grinder with great results. Haven't had a single disc break apart, and seem to last just as long as the big box stores. I have cut mild steel, stainless, and aluminum with these with no issues. The little amount of metal near the collet does a great job helping these grip and not spin in place. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fits the milwaukee M12 cutoff saw
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the Milwaukee M12 cut off saw. So far I've used 2 disks the first one exploded half way through a piece of 3/8 all thread. The second one seems to be doing good so far. Hopefully the first one was just a dud and the rest preform better.
customer_reviews.author: hheath

customer_reviews.title: These don't have a true 3/8" hole size
customer_reviews.text: The mounting hole is actually too big for the die grinder flange. These say 3/8" (.375) but are actually 3.89 which gives too much side clearance for them to ride on the die grinder flange without moving. I won't buy another pack.
customer_reviews.author: HudsonStudebakerguy

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but not nearly as thin as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are only about 15-20% thinner than the normal 1/16" wheels - I measure them at about 0.050". I first bought a pack of 1/16" wheels and then bought these hoping for a faster cut given the limited horsepower of my air tool - but since they're not nearly as thin as advertised, there isn't that much difference. Still, in retrospect I'd have bought these ones first - but it doesn't seem to make a lot of sense to buy both.
customer_reviews.author: E Dudzik

customer_reviews.title: Fast cutting, fast wearing
customer_reviews.text: These discs are approximately 40 thousandths of an inch thick, measured with calipers. A 1/16th thick 3" cutoff disc measured the same way is about 80 thous. For reference, I measure a thin Dremel cutoff disc at about 24 thousandths. An angle grinder cutoff disc at 60 thousandths. They wear faster than I expected. But they cut nice and fast and the fiberglass backing does a pretty good job of keeping them in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter McGavin

customer_reviews.title: Makes cutting steel parts quick
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been cutting through sway bar end links and hardened bolts on the exhaust with ease. Still haven’t had to change the disk. Good bite to the disk and it seems to wear pretty slow.
customer_reviews.author: f p

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cutting Wheels
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cutting wheels, long lasting and efficient. I highly recommend for you to buy these, I cut a lot of aluminum and brass and they last long.
customer_reviews.author: NdO PgO

customer_reviews.title: Won’t cut. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: That are the worst cut off wheels I have ever used. That don’t cut. Sent them back for a refund . Instead they sent more of the same . Which absolutely did not want . Sent those back as soon as they arrived. Now they are saying they did not receive them. So beware I feel that when you buy this and find out there not only to big and rub your guard and won’t cut . This company’ will make it impossible to get your money back
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Great value cuts like butter no exploding discs
customer_reviews.text: I was suprised i with how great these worked. For being 1 /32 i thought i was going to need 3 or 4 to complete my project and shatter at least 1 or 2 more. But that was not the case(they are a cutting disc not grinding) I was able to finish my project with 1 disc they cut way better then my 3m green disc once they cut the metal i was able to just cute like a hot knife through soft butter. I wish i had these before i started my project. I may even pick some up for my 4 1/2 grinder too.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Considering how much cheaper these are than Norton and even home Depot's husky per piece, I'd say these out perform both. I know it's heavy with but I burn through a couple disks of Norton and husky cutting through a 1.5" exhaust pipe while having left over of one of these (not much but enough for a few more small cuts). Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Drew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent consumable tool.
customer_reviews.text: These cutoff wheels slice thru steel like a knife. I used them for making alterations to a Motorcycle gas tank and they performed just like I envisioned. The hole for the arbor is reinforced so no chance of side pressure causing the disc to fly apart.
customer_reviews.author: T2jk

customer_reviews.title: US MADE
customer_reviews.text: excellent grinding flex disc, I do a lot of mower blades including 1/4 thick ZTR blades with hardened edge can get average 3 sets of this type of blade before performance drops off, on non hardened blades can go through many blades without replacing disc, holds up better than China made disc
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Basic cutting disks
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to cut metal with your grinder, these are the disks to get first. They are good, basic disks that do what they are designed for. Just know that you are not going to replace your sawzall or cutting torch with these for bigger jobs or thicker metals. Like basically all tools, in a short time you will figure out what they work well on, and what they don't.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great cutoff wheels
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I use them to cut steel and I'm happy with how fast they cut and how long they last. You can make accurate cuts with them and they are easier to steer than others I've used--and if you're using the ones from Harbor Freight, you don't know what you're missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and takes abuse
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with these. Using them on an electric die grinder, mostly for grinding down rust and weld beads, they work really well. I'm still on my first disc and I've done a BUNCH of grinding with it, in all imaginable ways (straight-on, angled, sweeping back and forth), and it never broke. I wasn't gentle about it, either. But if you want a light touch (like grinding surface rust) it works well for that too. These discs on an electric die grinder makes the ultimate fabricator's tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Eilers

customer_reviews.title: These Cut off wheels are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: The quality and quantity you get for the price is the BEST! These wheels are great and top notch! I have paid same price for just a 3 pack and yet here I get 25 with the same arbor and thinness that makes a great cut off wheel... Will purchase again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny A

customer_reviews.title: Typical grinding wheel
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, what you would expect from a grinding wheel. Fits Milwaukee m12 cut off tool.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: durable cutoff wheels
customer_reviews.text: reinforced cutoff wheels were excellent for our needs --- removing sheet metal panels and cutoff deteriorated hardware. used properly and not forcing the cut got very good service in our application..would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I won't be buying cutoff wheels locally anymore
customer_reviews.text: I have usually purchased my cutoff wheels locally, trying different brands and them performing well in most cases. These cutoff wheels seem to last me much longer than the local ones I get (ACE, Dewalt, odd-brand). That plus having many extras on hand is excellent. I'm very happy with these so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W

customer_reviews.title: Low quality composite wheels.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write product reviews, but after experiencing the terrible quality of these, I felt compelled to warn others to purchase another product. I intended on using these with my Milwaukee mini cutoff wheel, but after realizing they don’t cut, but rather just rely on friction to just melt the metal, I bit the bullet and spent the extra money on the Milwaukee cutoff discs instead. After my experience with the one cutoff wheel I used, I have 24 unused cutoff wheels, I’ll likely have sit around my shop for the rest of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Spend more time changing worn discs than cutting
customer_reviews.text: I got these because of the amount for the price and it said in the Q&A that it fits the dremel saw max, well it don’t unless you force it on with the nut. Even then though the disc burns down to a useless diameter super fast that you Spend more time changing disc than making cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Savage Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice cut off wheels
customer_reviews.text: These are much better than the no name brand that I was using. They last longer and cut faster. I have not had any break or disintegrate either. I will buy these again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cuozzo

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to cut metal from a curb, product worked great only needed one to cut through concrete and metal, still have enough to use on another project
customer_reviews.author: TIM J. SINGLETON

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: These things are thin and strong. Still using the first one. Takes mild abuse well but you really don't have to force these things to cut. Keep the rpms up and just enough pressure to avoid bounce.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase. It's a cut off wheel - - Not much I can say other than they don't fly apart at high speeds like the ones you would buy at the cheap tool store ( H F ) Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Bull

customer_reviews.title: Good cut off wheel.
customer_reviews.text: What more is there to say, it's a cut off wheel. It does it's job and had no problems with the wheels. I like the thinner wheels for my work so I am a lot more careful on how I treat the project so I don't bind it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn DiOrio

customer_reviews.title: Cut-off wheels that cut-off
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Bought these for the M12 grinder. Fits perfect and while I haven't put these to a severe test for basic cutting and trimming of smaller items it works great.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Works with the Milwaukee Cut off tool
customer_reviews.text: I use them all the time with the cut off tool
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Slow cutting
customer_reviews.text: These cut very slow. They last a long time but that is a poor trade off for cutting speed. They are also 4 1/8 diameter so rub on gaurd at first. Overall I'm very disappointed and would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zaltana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for our saw at work. The price is so much better for these than they are buying them in the store. We will continue buying these!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquiejones10

customer_reviews.title: Finally a cutting disc thats thin!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a cutting disc that's thin! Others I picked up from HD where not the thinness specified and too fat. These were as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: WTFOver

customer_reviews.title: I have not used but they appear sound
customer_reviews.text: Although, I have not had a chance to use them. they really appear to be a good product. they appear to be accurately described in the advertisement.. I cannot speak for longevity since I have not used them yet
customer_reviews.author: GDA

customer_reviews.title: Good cut off wheels
customer_reviews.text: The cut off wheels are very strong well worth the money . I was very surprised .I have paid big money for a cut off wheels these equal to be the same
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: By far the best cutting wheels I have ever used. I have used thousands in the naval shipyard as a sheetmetal mechanic and shipfitter for 30 years. You won't regret getting these.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Avery

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cut-off wheels
customer_reviews.text: Used one on several 3/8" bolts that needed trimming. Wheel did the job and looked like it had no wear.
customer_reviews.author: Danny B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Cut off wheels have a good life span and don't have issues with randomly exploding. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Menitar

customer_reviews.title: Too BIG! Measuring 4-1/8" not 4-1/16"
customer_reviews.text: The ones that showed up to me hit my guard because they are too big in diameter. Once they are worn down they work great (unlike the ones from H@rb0r Fr3!ght that disintegrated after a few seconds).
customer_reviews.author: Get A Grip

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: bought these to replace floors in ford truck, They work well and seem to last a reasonable amount of time for cutting thru rust
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These are lasting quite a while for me. I use them to knock down welds and grinding inside 90° weld seams. They last forever in this manner. Cutting seems to be better than whatever brand I've gotten last
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonably priced...
customer_reviews.text: I use in my prototype builds, of sheet metal fabrication. Perfect high speed wheels, using air grinders.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: How well they stand up to normal use.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping, discs look to be of good quality but have not put them into use yet.
customer_reviews.author: Double D

customer_reviews.title: Recommended at tool purchase
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly. We have only used the cutting disc for a short time, but it looks like a winner.
customer_reviews.author: frank yaconiello

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used Wheels made in the US for 40 Years professionally. These are extremely unforgiving compared to what I've used over the years. Any out of square twist imposed while cutting make these wheels EXPLODE into small pieces!!! Of course I wear safety glasses, etc. Was not injured the times multiple wheels failed. Don't waste your money or safety on these wheels.
customer_reviews.author: James Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Moneys worth
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel like good blades. I have not had a chance to use them yet but for the price I think they will do just fine. Packed tight and in tact.
customer_reviews.author: yay

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the product
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell when I use the cutting disks and the materials I use them on.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Didn"t know cutoff wheels were this good!
customer_reviews.text: One of these wheels lasted longer than 10 of the cheaper HF wheels. Installed a complete Stainless exhaust system and many other cuts with one wheel. I think it is best to store in a very dry area, high summer humidity will soften and shorten the life of any fiber cutoff or grinding wheels. I will buy the again if I ever wear out the other 19 wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Young

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Only used on one project so far but is holding up great, fits onto my grinder perfectly. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: THUMPER

customer_reviews.title: Good wheels
customer_reviews.text: They work as advertised, nothing remarkable other than being a decent quality cutting wheel.
customer_reviews.author: michelled

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: excellent items at a good price shipped very quickly THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Motte

customer_reviews.title: great discs
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described. fit my grinder perfectly & wear very well. 7
customer_reviews.author: Boyd Bailey

customer_reviews.title: warped
customer_reviews.text: These thing are warped, I bought the thinner ones so I could get a straight cut but these wobble so bad I cant cut a straight line in 16 gauge sheet metal.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Thay last and cut well
customer_reviews.text: I use these for auto frame work better than expected wear well suprised for sure,
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 4"
customer_reviews.text: Pack I received were all 4-1/8" and thus would not fit inside the guard of my cutting tool. Return.
customer_reviews.author: HRNT DRVR

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Better than Dremel brand and others for cutting sheet metal, especially stainless steel. Yes, you can use it with Dremel saw-max tool if you use your own washers (though keep in mind this may change whether or not the guide is accurate).
customer_reviews.author: M.P.

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: they have cut everything I've need to cut but I remember from past that you will go through wheels fairly quickly that why I bought the large pack worth it
customer_reviews.author: RJM

customer_reviews.title: They last!
customer_reviews.text: I do occasional metal work and these disks are quite long lasting. I mainly use them on grinding or cutting out old steel rivets in auto frames.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Be Happier
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Awesome product and great value for the money. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Slices
customer_reviews.text: purchased to cutoff metal rods 1/2 in diameter. Slices like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Moosehead

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy HF cutoff wheels again.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, long lasting. Up until now I have been buying HF wheels because they were inexpensive. Cheap is a better description. Never again. Talk about a night and day difference. They cut fast and most important, "They Last".
customer_reviews.author: LEE R.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I thought these were gonna blow apart on me because of how cheap they are but they have held up great
customer_reviews.author: Big Bray

customer_reviews.title: Work well, so far very durable
customer_reviews.text: Made multiple cuts in both 1/16” aluminum and even some 1/2” steel, still on the first wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: quality for value
customer_reviews.text: the discs came well packed, have used a couple of them, they have a slightly less cutting life than the more expensive brands, but for the price of these discs, can't complain
customer_reviews.author: Gurdial

customer_reviews.title: Cuts
customer_reviews.text: Worked good cutting through exhaust pipe but first one I tightened on the gringer the metal ring came loose and wouldn't spin so pretty cheap but cuts good
customer_reviews.author: J Perry

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fast
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done fast and easy. Not too brittle at all. Fast shipping,great price
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's advertised to do. Better price than the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: David Goeking

customer_reviews.title: They will cut!
customer_reviews.text: These are well made wheels.Buy them! They cut very well.
customer_reviews.author: Concrete Chris

customer_reviews.title: Reaches where saws cannot.
customer_reviews.text: Have to be careful and go slow when cutting conduit so it does not come off. Worked well getting where nothing else would have.
customer_reviews.author: Big G

customer_reviews.title: it worked for me
customer_reviews.text: great product, this worked really well for the job that had to do. Would buy again if I am needing more .
customer_reviews.author: james watters

customer_reviews.title: disc
customer_reviews.text: very good disc. If i have a need will order more.
customer_reviews.author: wgr

customer_reviews.title: All was good
customer_reviews.text: All was expected. Good cutting... Last well enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wor
customer_reviews.text: The work as they should and certainly last a lot longer than the one that came with the die grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B

customer_reviews.title: These are a great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are cut off wheels, their life all depends on what you are cutting with them. I use these in my Shaft-Blaster tool that is to cut off motor shafts on HVAC motors. These last the longest of any I have found. When I need more I will order more from them.
customer_reviews.author: James Chesher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cut off wheels
customer_reviews.text: Love these wheels, nice and thin for quick accurate cuts
customer_reviews.author: Jim Piz

customer_reviews.title: make sure order the ones that fit your die grinder
customer_reviews.text: Work as well or better thn other cutoff wheels that I have used. Convenient not having to go shopping. Delivered to mydoor.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur W. Ricker, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant about these wheels based on the low price. I am very impressed by their quality and performance. They last long and cut quickly. I have been using them for everything and will be buying more when I eventually run out.
customer_reviews.author: Jes S

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant about these wheels based on the low price. I am very impressed by their quality and performance. They last long and cut quickly. I have been using them for everything and will be buying more when I eventually run out.
customer_reviews.author: Jes S

customer_reviews.title: Decent Cut Off Disks
customer_reviews.text: These are fiberglass based disks vs Kevlar disks that I was replacing.. these cut just the same. I was impressed. I can’t compare the wear factor as of yet but what I’ve cut so far, I’m liking these disks.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny_4321

customer_reviews.title: Work good for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are made pretty good and haven’t given me any issues. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ed from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product & Company !!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product... They LAST along time and cut very good. Like the 4" size and would buy again! Delivered when promised GREAT company and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Ostrowski

customer_reviews.title: Cut through quarter inch steel no problem
customer_reviews.text: For a very thin wheel lasted longer than I thought it would. Cut very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do a good job
customer_reviews.text: Fast cutting seem to last a long time, what I bought will last a long time Only use them once in a while
customer_reviews.author: David L Brown

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced product really surprised at how long they last. I have cut lots of metal and ground down numerous welds and I'm still on my 1st disc out of the box. Well satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: James West

customer_reviews.title: die grinder grinding wheels
customer_reviews.text: Nice pack of grinding wheels and perfect size for die grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great tough 3" discs
customer_reviews.text: I've been a mechanic for over 30 years and I wanted something good for home, because I've used really incredible discs and really bad cheap ones. These discs are tough and hold up great. I don't usually send reviews, but I like these discs.
customer_reviews.author: sco.tt b

customer_reviews.title: darn good cutoff discs
customer_reviews.text: these are probably the best 4" cutoff disc iv'e ever used. i have used cutoff disc a long time

customer_reviews.title: did the job
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed and priced right too willbuy again when needed

customer_reviews.title: Great cutoff wheels
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my long reach cutoff wheel tool an there work great. Happy with the product.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I ordered. Good quality. Decent price. Very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Works nice with the Milwaukee 12v 31/2” saw
customer_reviews.text: I like them it’s a fine cutting wheel .Would definitely buy this product again.

customer_reviews.title: Good Cutting Disk
customer_reviews.text: Cuts quickly compared to 1/16" thick cutting wheel. I bought disk with wrong size assembly hole. I should have bought disk with 3/8" diameter hole. Now I have to drill out center hole to use.
customer_reviews.author: michael koga

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I use this size and type of cutoff wheel all the time, a small kerf is highly desirable,in metal work.

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: So far I only had to use one of these as it seems to last forever.

customer_reviews.text: use product for shaping contours and edges of wooden products

customer_reviews.title: cut just as well as the high dollar wheels!
customer_reviews.text: I use mostly for sheet metal work on hotrods. fast free delivery..

customer_reviews.title: Work well.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to hold up well for my DIY needs. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Keep buying them they are great
customer_reviews.text: Love these, 2nd time I have ordered, great quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: cindy burris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap is only the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect much from cheap priced cutting wheels. I haven’t gone through much but the blades took a beating. Cutting steel at awkward angles and wearing out very slowly without exploding or cracking deserves a 6 star value ratio.

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting wheels for die grinders.
customer_reviews.text: The abrasive wheels work great on my cordless die grinder. They go through steel quickly and very smoothly.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money. I'll purchase again

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: By far the longest lasting cut off wheel ive purchased

product_meta.title: BHA Metal and Stainless Steel Cut Off Wheels for Die Grinders, 3” x 1/32” x 1/4” - 25 Pack
product_meta.description: Size:3” x 1/32” x 1/4”3” x .03” x 1/4” Cut-Off Wheels by Black Hawk Abrasives are thin but strong die grinder cutting discs built for fast slicing even on hard materials. Also, sometimes called whiz wheels, these 3 inch cutting wheels are made with reinforced fiberglass mesh and a heat-treated aluminum oxide grain bonding matrix for additional safety, lateral stability, and increased longevity. These 3” x .03” x 1/4” cutoff disc have a 3 inch diameter making them perfect for cutting in hard to reach places.
feature_bullets: 3" x 1/32" x 1/4" Arbor Cut Off Wheel
25 Pack Premium 3" Diameter Metal Cutting Discs
Great Choice for cutting various metals
Proprietary aluminum oxide grain for agressive cutting action

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars716 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
